Texts.Chs: 把 ^orange;钢铁战刃^reset;带到^orange;科学前哨站^reset;交给我
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;steel warblade^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 优秀，希望你能享受切割物品的快感。这是我给你的。
Texts.Eng: Excellent, enjoy cutting stuff up. Here, take this off my hands.

Texts.Chs: 我就直说了。我的剑很辣鸡。给我做个新的。去你的^orange;装配间^reset;给我做一把^orange;钢铁战刃^reset;！你需要先升级你的^orange;护甲工作台^reset;。
Texts.Eng: I'll be blunt. My sword sucks. Make me a new one. Go craft a ^orange;Steel Warblade^reset; in your ^orange;Assembly Line^reset;! You'll need to upgrade your ^orange;Armorworks^reset; first.
